GV05chup___u:999: tad dhaitad ghora āṅgirasaḥ kṛṣṇāya devakīputrāyoktvovāca |
GV05chup___u:1001: so 'ntavelāyām etat trayaṃ pratipadyetākṣitam asy acyutam asi prāṇasaṃśitam asīti |
GV05chup___u:1007: devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam iti jyotir uttamam iti || ChUp_3,17.7 ||
GV05chup___u:1012: ity ubhayam ādiṣṭaṃ bhavaty adhyātmaṃ cādhidaivataṃ ca || ChUp_3,18.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1014: vāk pādaḥ prāṇaḥ pādaś cakṣuḥ pādaḥ śrotraṃ pādaḥ |
GV05chup___u:1017: agniḥ pādo vāyuḥ pāda ādityaḥ pādo diśaḥ pādaḥ |
GV05chup___u:1018: ity ubhayam evādiṣṭaṃ bhavaty adhyātmaṃ cādhidaivataṃ ca || ChUp_3,18.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1020: so 'gninā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca |
GV05chup___u:1021: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_3,18.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1023: sa vāyunā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca |
GV05chup___u:1024: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_3,18.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1026: sa ādityena jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca |
GV05chup___u:1027: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_3,18.5 ||
GV05chup___u:1029: sa digbhir jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca |
GV05chup___u:1030: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_3,18.6 ||
GV05chup___u:1039: te āṇḍakapāle rajataṃ ca suvarṇaṃ cābhavatām || ChUp_3,19.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1045: yad vāsteyam udakaṃ sa samudraḥ || ChUp_3,19.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1046: atha yat tad ajāyata so 'sāv ādityaḥ |
GV05chup___u:1047: taṃ jāyamānaṃ ghoṣā ulūlavo 'nūdatiṣṭhant sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmāḥ |
GV05chup___u:1048: tasmāt tasyodayaṃ prati pratyāyanaṃ prati ghoṣā ulūlavo 'nūttiṣṭhanti sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmāḥ || ChUp_3,19.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1049: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān ādityaṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chup___u:1050: abhyāśo ha yad enaṃ sādhavo ghoṣā ā ca gaccheyur upa ca nimreḍeran nimreḍeran || ChUp_3,19.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1051: jānaśrutir ha pautrāyaṇaḥ śraddhādeyo bahudāyī bahupākya āsa |
GV05chup___u:1052: sa ha sarvata āvasathān māpayāṃ cakre sarvata eva me 'nnam atsyantīti || ChUp_4,1.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1055: ho ho 'yi bhallākṣa bhallākṣa jānaśruteḥ pautrāyaṇasya samaṃ divā jyotir ātataṃ tan mā prasāṅkṣīs tat tvāṃ mā pradhākṣīr iti || ChUp_4,1.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1056: tam u ha paraḥ pratyuvāca kam v ara enam etat santaṃ sayugvānam iva raikvam āttha iti |
GV05chup___u:1057: yo nu kathaṃ sayugvā raikva iti || ChUp_4,1.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1058: yathā kṛtāya vijitāyādhareyāḥ saṃyanty evam enaṃ sarvaṃ tad abhisameti yat kiṃca prajāḥ sādhu kurvanti |
GV05chup___u:1059: yas tad veda yat sa veda sa mayaitad ukta iti || ChUp_4,1.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1060: tad u ha jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇa upaśuśrāva |
GV05chup___u:1061: sa ha saṃjihāna eva kṣattāram uvācāṅgāre ha sayugvānam iva raikvam āttheti |
GV05chup___u:1062: yo nu kathaṃ sayugvā raikva iti || ChUp_4,1.5 ||
GV05chup___u:1063: yathā kṛtāya vijitāyādhareyāḥ saṃyanty evam enaṃ sarvaṃ tad abhisameti yat kiṃca prajāḥ sādhu kurvanti |
GV05chup___u:1064: yas tad veda yat sa veda sa mayaitad ukta iti || ChUp_4,1.6 ||
GV05chup___u:1065: sa ha kṣattānviṣya nāvidam iti pratyeyāya |
GV05chup___u:1066: taṃ hovāca yatrāre brāhmaṇasyānveṣaṇā tad enam arccheti || ChUp_4,1.7 ||
GV05chup___u:1068: taṃ hābhyuvāda tvaṃ nu bhagavaḥ sayugvā raikva iti |
GV05chup___u:1069: ahaṃ hy arā 3 iti ha pratijajñe |
GV05chup___u:1070: sa ha kṣattāvidam iti pratyeyāya || ChUp_4,1.8 ||
GV05chup___u:1071: tad u ha jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ ṣaṭ śatāni gavāṃ niṣkam aśvatarīrathaṃ tad ādāya praticakrame |
GV05chup___u:1073: raikvemāni ṣaṭ śatāni gavām ayaṃ niṣko 'yam aśvatarīrathaḥ |
GV05chup___u:1074: anu ma etāṃ bhagavo devatāṃ śādhi yāṃ devatām upāssa iti || ChUp_4,2.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1075: tam u ha paraḥ pratyuvācāha hāretvā śūdra tavaiva saha gobhir astv iti |
GV05chup___u:1076: tad u ha punar eva jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ sahasraṃ gavāṃ niṣkam aśvatarīrathaṃ duhitaraṃ tad ādāya praticakrame || ChUp_4,2.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1078: raikvedaṃ sahasraṃ gavām ayaṃ niṣko 'yam aśvatarīratha iyaṃ jāyāyaṃ grāmo yasminn āsse 'nv eva mā bhagavaḥ śādhīti || ChUp_4,2.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1079: tasyā ha mukham upodgṛhṇann uvācājahāremāḥ śūdrānenaiva mukhenālāpayiṣyathā iti |
GV05chup___u:1080: te haite raikvaparṇā nāma mahāvṛṣeṣu yatrāsmā uvāsa |
GV05chup___u:1083: yadā vā agnir udvāyati vāyum evāpyeti |
GV05chup___u:1085: yadā candro 'stam eti vāyum evāpyeti || ChUp_4,3.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1091: sa yadā svapiti prāṇam eva vāg apy eti |
GV05chup___u:1095: prāṇo hy evaitān sarvān saṃvṛṅkta iti || ChUp_4,3.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1097: vāyur eva deveṣu prāṇaḥ prāṇeṣu || ChUp_4,3.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1098: atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kāpeyam abhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe |
GV05chup___u:1099: tasmā u ha na dadatuḥ || ChUp_4,3.5 ||
GV05chup___u:1101: mahātmanaś caturo deva ekaḥ kaḥ sa jagāra bhuvanasya gopāḥ |
GV05chup___u:1102: taṃ kāpeya nābhipaśyanti martyā abhipratārin bahudhā vasantam |
GV05chup___u:1103: yasmai vā etad annaṃ tasmā etan na dattam iti || ChUp_4,3.6 ||
GV05chup___u:1104: tad u ha śaunakaḥ kāpeyaḥ pratimanvānaḥ pratyeyāya |
GV05chup___u:1105: ātmā devānāṃ janitā prajānāṃ hiraṅyadaṃṣṭro babhaso 'nasūriḥ |
GV05chup___u:1106: mahāntam asya mahimānam āhur anadyamāno yad anannam atti |
GV05chup___u:1107: iti vai vayam brahmacārin nedam upāsmahe dattāsmai bhikṣām iti || ChUp_4,3.7 ||
GV05chup___u:1109: te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santas tat kṛtam |
GV05chup___u:1110: tasmāt sarvāsu dikṣv annam eva daśa kṛtam |
GV05chup___u:1113: sarvam asya idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavaty annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_4,3.8 ||
GV05chup___u:1114: satyakāmo ha jābālo jabālāṃ mātaram āmantrayāṃ cakre |
GV05chup___u:1115: brahmacaryaṃ bhavati vivatsyāmi kiṃgotro nv aham asmīti || ChUp_4,4.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1117: nāham etad veda tāta yadgotras tvam asi |
GV05chup___u:1118: bahv aham carantī paricāriṇī yauvane tvām alabhe |
GV05chup___u:1119: sāham etan na veda yadgotras tvam asi |
GV05chup___u:1122: sa satyakāma eva jābālo bruvīthā iti || ChUp_4,4.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1128: nāham etad veda bho yadgotro 'ham asmi |
GV05chup___u:1130: sā mā pratyabravīd bahv aham carantī paricariṇī yauvane tvām alabhe |
GV05chup___u:1131: sāham etan na veda yadgotras tvam asi |
GV05chup___u:1134: so 'haṃ satyakāmo jābālo 'smi bho iti || ChUp_4,4.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1138: upa tvā neṣye na satyād agā iti |
GV05chup___u:1139: tam upanīya kṛśānām abalānāṃ catuḥśatā gā nirākṛtya uvācemāḥ somyānusaṃvrajeti |
GV05chup___u:1148: brahmaṇaś ca te pādaṃ bravāṇi iti |
GV05chup___u:1155: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān nāma || ChUp_4,5.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1156: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān ity upāste prakāśavān asmiṃl loke bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1157: prakāśavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān ity upāste || ChUp_4,5.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1159: sa ha śvo bhūte gā abhiprasthāpayāṃ cakāra |
GV05chup___u:1160: tā yatrābhisāyaṃ babhūvus tatrāgnim upasamādhāya gā uparudhya samidham ādhāya paścād agneḥ prāṅ upopaviveśa || ChUp_4,6.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1170: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇo 'nantavān nāma || ChUp_4,6.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1171: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo 'nantavān ity upāste 'nantavān asmiṃl loke bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1172: anantavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo 'nantavān ity upāste || ChUp_4,6.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1180: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān nāma || ChUp_4,7.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1181: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān ity upāste jyotiṣmān asmiṃl loke bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1182: jyotiṣmato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān ity upāste || ChUp_4,7.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1184: sa ha śvo bhūte gā abhiprasthāpayāṃ cakāra |
GV05chup___u:1185: tā yatrābhisāyaṃ babhūvus tatrāgnim upasamādhāya gā uparudhya samidham ādhāya paścād agneḥ prāṅ upopaviveśa || ChUp_4,8.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1195: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇa āyatanavān nāma || ChUp_4,8.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1196: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇa āyatanavān ity upāsta āyatanavān asmiṃl loke bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1197: āyatanavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇa āyatanavān ity upāste || ChUp_4,8.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1204: bhagavāṃs tv eva me kāme brūyāt || ChUp_4,9.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1205: śrutaṃ hy eva me bhagavaddṛśebhya ācāryād dhaiva vidyā viditā sādhiṣṭhaṃ prāpatīti |
GV05chup___u:1207: atra ha na kiṃcana vīyāyeti vīyāyeti || ChUp_4,9.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1208: upakosalo ha vai kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacāryam uvāsa |
GV05chup___u:1209: tasya ha dvādaśa vārṣāny agnīn paricacāra |
GV05chup___u:1210: sa ha smānyān antevāsinaḥ samāvartayaṃs taṃ ha smaiva na samāvartayati || ChUp_4,10.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1211: taṃ jāyovāca tapto brahmacārī kuśalam agnīn paricacārīt |
GV05chup___u:1218: sa ha uvāca bahava ime 'smin puruṣe kāmā nānātyāyāḥ |
GV05chup___u:1224: prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti || ChUp_4,10.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1227: kaṃ ca tu khaṃ ca na vijānāmīti |
GV05chup___u:1229: yad vāva kaṃ tad eva kham |
GV05chup___u:1230: yad eva khaṃ tad eva kam iti |
GV05chup___u:1231: prāṇaṃ ca hāsmai tad ākāśaṃ cocuḥ || ChUp_4,10.5 ||
GV05chup___u:1232: atha hainaṃ gārhapatyo 'nuśaśāsa pṛthivy agnir annam āditya iti |
GV05chup___u:1233: ya eṣa āditye puruṣo dṛśyate so 'ham asmi sa eva aham asmi iti || ChUp_4,11.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1234: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste |
GV05chup___u:1240: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca |
GV05chup___u:1241: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste || ChUp_4,11.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1242: atha ha enam anvāhāryapacano 'nuśaśāsa āpo diśo nakṣatrāṇi candramā iti |
GV05chup___u:1243: ya eṣa candramasi puruṣo dṛṣyate so 'ham asmi sa eva aham asmi iti || ChUp_4,12.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1244: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste |
GV05chup___u:1250: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca |
GV05chup___u:1251: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste || ChUp_4,12.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1252: atha hainam āhavanīyo 'nuśaśāsa prāṇa ākāśo dyaur vidyud iti |
GV05chup___u:1253: ya eṣa vidyuti puruṣo dṛśyate so 'ham asmi sa evāham asmīti || ChUp_4,13.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1254: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste |
GV05chup___u:1260: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca |
GV05chup___u:1261: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste || ChUp_4,13.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1270: ko nu mānuśiśyād bho itīhāpeva nihnute |
GV05chup___u:1271: ime nūnam īdṛśā anyādṛśā itīhāgnīn abhyūde |
GV05chup___u:1272: kiṃ nu somya kila te 'vocann iti || ChUp_4,14.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1275: ahaṃ tu te tad vakṣyāmi yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evam evaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyata iti |
GV05chup___u:1278: ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca |
GV05chup___u:1280: tad yady apy asmin sarpir vodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati || ChUp_4,15.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1283: sarvāṇy enaṃ vāmāny abhisaṃyanti ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_4,15.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1286: sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_4,15.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1289: sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_4,15.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1290: atha yad u caivāsmiñ chavyaṃ kurvanti yadi ca nārciṣam evābhisaṃbhavanti |
GV05chup___u:1293: āpūryamāṇapakṣād yān ṣaḍ udaṅṅ eti māsāṃs tān |
GV05chup___u:1301: etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartante nāvartante || ChUp_4,15.5 ||
GV05chup___u:1302: eṣa ha vai yajño yo 'yaṃ pavate |
GV05chup___u:1303: eṣa ha yann idaṃ sarvaṃ punāti |
GV05chup___u:1304: yad eṣa yann idaṃ sarvaṃ punāti |
GV05chup___u:1306: tasya manaś ca vāk ca vartanī || ChUp_4,16.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1309: sa yatropākṛte prātaranuvāke purā paridhānīyāyā brahmā vyavavadati || ChUp_4,16.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1312: sa yathaikapād vrajan ratho vaikena cakreṇa vartamāno riṣyaty evam asya yajño riṣyati |
GV05chup___u:1315: atha yatra upākṛte prātaranuvāke na purā paridhānīyāyā brahmā vyavavadaty ubhe eva vartanī saṃskurvanti |
GV05chup___u:1317: sa yathobhayapād vrajan ratho vobhābhyāṃ cakrābhyāṃ vartamānaḥ pratitiṣṭhaty evam asya yajñaḥ pratitiṣṭhati yajñaṃ pratitiṣṭhantaṃ yajamāno 'nu pratitiṣṭhati |
GV05chup___u:1334: tad yady ṛkto riṣyed bhūḥ svāheti gārhapatye juhuyāt |
GV05chup___u:1335: ṛcām eva tadrasenarcāṃ vīryeṇarcāṃ yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti || ChUp_4,17.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1336: atha yadi yajuṣṭo riṣyed bhuvaḥ svāheti dakṣiṇāgnau juhuyāt |
GV05chup___u:1337: yajuṣām eva tadrasena yajuṣāṃ vīryeṇa yajuṣāṃ yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti || ChUp_4,17.5 ||
GV05chup___u:1338: atha yadi sāmato riṣyet svaḥ svāhety āhavanīye juhuyāt |
GV05chup___u:1339: sāmnām eva tadrasena sāmnāṃ vīryeṇa sāmnāṃ yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti || ChUp_4,17.6 ||
GV05chup___u:1341: suvarṇena rajataṃ rajatena trapu trapuṇā sīsaṃ sīsena lohaṃ lohena dāru dāru carmaṇā || ChUp_4,17.7 ||
GV05chup___u:1342: evam eṣāṃ lokānām āsāṃ devatānām asyās trayyā vidyāyā vīryeṇa yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti |
GV05chup___u:1343: bheṣajakṛto ha vā eṣa yajño yatraivaṃvid brahmā bhavati || ChUp_4,17.8 ||
GV05chup___u:1344: eṣa ha vā udakpravaṇo yajño yatraivaṃvid brahmā bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1345: evaṃvidaṃ ha vā eṣā brahmāṇam anu gāthā |
GV05chup___u:1346: yato yata āvartate tat tad gacchati || ChUp_4,17.9 ||
GV05chup___u:1349: evaṃvid dha vai brahmā yajñaṃ yajamānaṃ sarvāṃś cartvijo 'bhirakṣati |
GV05chup___u:1350: tasmād evaṃvidam eva brahmāṇaṃ kurvīta nānevaṃvidaṃ nānevaṃvidam || ChUp_4,17.10 ||
GV05chup___u:1351: yo ha vai jyeṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda jyeṣṭhaś ca ha vai śreṣṭhaś ca bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1352: prāṇo vāva jyeṣṭhaś ca śreṣṭhaś ca || ChUp_5,1.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1353: yo ha vai vasiṣṭhaṃ veda vasiṣṭho ha svānāṃ bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1355: yo ha vai pratiṣṭhāṃ veda prati ha tiṣṭhaty asmiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca |
GV05chup___u:1357: yo ha vai saṃpadaṃ veda saṃ hāsmai kāmāḥ padyante daivāś ca mānuṣāś ca |
GV05chup___u:1359: yo ha vā āyatanaṃ vedāyatanaṃ ha svānāṃ bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1362: ahaṃ śreyān asmy ahaṃ śreyān asmīti || ChUp_5,1.6 ||
GV05chup___u:1363: te ha prāṇāḥ prajāpatiṃ pitaram etyocuḥ bhagavan ko naḥ śreṣṭha iti |

GV05chup___u:1414: amāvāsyāyām dīkṣitvā paurṇamāsyāṃ rātrau sarvauṣadhasya mantham dadhimadhunor upamathya jyeṣṭhāya śreṣṭhāya svāhety agnāv ājyasya hutvā manthe saṃpātam avanayet || ChUp_5,2.4 ||

GV05chup___u:1552: atha ya iha kapūyacaraṇā abhyāśo ha yat te kapūyāṃ yonim āpadyerañ śvayonim vā sūkarayoniṃ vā caṇḍālayoniṃ vā || ChUp_5,10.7 ||
GV05chup___u:1553: athaitayoḥ pathor na katareṇacana tānīmāni kṣudrāṇy asakṛdāvartīni bhūtāni bhavanti jāyasva mriyasveti |

GV05chup___u:1687: atha ya etad evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu sarveṣv ātmasu hutaṃ bhavati || ChUp_5,24.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1688: tad yatheṣīkātūlam agnau protaṃ pradūyetaivaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyante ya etad evaṃ vidvān agnihotraṃ juhoti || ChUp_5,24.3 ||

GV05chup___u:1697: sa ha dvādaśavarṣa upetya caturviṃśativarṣaḥ sarvān vedān adhītya mahāmanā anūcānamānī stabdha eyāya |
GV05chup___u:1699: śvetaketo yan nu somyedaṃ mahāmanā anūcānamānī stabdho 'si |
GV05chup___u:1700: uta tam ādeśam aprākṣyaḥ yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavaty amataṃ matam avijñātaṃ vijñātam iti |

GV05chup___u:1702: yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt |
GV05chup___u:1703: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttikety eva satyam || ChUp_6,1.4 ||

GV05chup___u:1705: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ loham ity eva satyam || ChUp_6,1.5 ||
GV05chup___u:1706: yathā somyaikena nakhanikṛntanena sarvaṃ kārṣṇāyasaṃ vijñātaṃ syāt |
GV05chup___u:1707: vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ kṛṣṇāyasam ity eva satyam |

GV05chup___u:1709: na vai nūnaṃ bhagavantas ta etad avediṣuḥ |

GV05chup___u:1711: iti bhagavāṃs tv eva me bravītv iti |
GV05chup___u:1713: sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam |

GV05chup___u:2098: tasmād yady api daśa rātrīr nāśnīyāt |
GV05chup___u:2101: athānnasyāye draṣṭā bhavati śrotā bhavati mantā bhavati boddhā bhavati kartā bhavati vijñātā bhavati |
GV05chup___u:2105: yāvad annasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo 'nnaṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chup___u:2108: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,9.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2110: tasmād yadā suvṛṣṭir na bhavati vyādhīyante prāṇā annaṃ kanīyo bhaviṣyatīti |
GV05chup___u:2111: atha yadā suvṛṣṭir bhavaty ānandinaḥ prāṇā bhavanty annaṃ bahu bhaviṣyatīti |
GV05chup___u:2112: āpa evemā mūrtā yeyaṃ pṛthivī yad antarikṣaṃ yad dyaur yat parvatā yad devamanuṣyā yat paśavaś ca vayāṃsi ca tṛṇavanaspatayaḥ śvāpadāny ākīṭapataṅgapipīlakam |
GV05chup___u:2117: yāvad apāṃ gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yo 'po brahmety upāste |
GV05chup___u:2120: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,10.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2122: tad vā etad vāyum āgṛhyākāśam abhitapati tadāhur niśocati nitapati varṣiṣyati vā iti |
GV05chup___u:2124: tad etad ūrdhvābhiś ca tiraścībhiś ca vidyudbhir āhrādāś caranti tasmād āhur vidyotate stanayati varṣiṣyati vā iti |
GV05chup___u:2128: tejasvī vai sa tejasvato lokān bhāsvato 'pahatatamaskān abhisidhyati |
GV05chup___u:2129: yāvat tejaso gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yas tejo brahmety upāste |
GV05chup___u:2132: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,11.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2134: ākāśe vai sūryācandramasāv ubhau vidyun nakṣatrāṇy agniḥ |
GV05chup___u:2144: ākāśavato vai sa lokān prakāśavato 'saṃbādhān urugāyavato 'bhisidhyati |
GV05chup___u:2145: yāvad ākāśasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati ya ākāśaṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chup___u:2148: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,12.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2150: tasmād yady api bahava āsīrann a smaranto naiva te kaṃcana śṛṇuyur na manvīran na vijānīran |
GV05chup___u:2151: yadā vāva te smareyur atha śṛṇuyur atha manvīrann atha vijānīran |
GV05chup___u:2152: smareṇa vai putrān vijānāti smareṇa paśūn |
GV05chup___u:2155: yāvat smarasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yaḥ smaraṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chup___u:2158: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,13.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2160: āśeddho vai smaro mantrān adhīte karmāṇi kurute putrāṃś ca paśūṃś cecchata imaṃ ca lokaṃ amuṃ cecchate |
GV05chup___u:2165: yāvad āśāyā gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati ya āśāṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chup___u:2168: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,14.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2170: yathā vā arā nābhau samarpitā evam asmin prāṇe sarvaṃ samarpitam |
GV05chup___u:2180: sa yadi pitaraṃ vā mātaraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vā svasāraṃ vācāryaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā kiṃcid bhṛśam iva pratyāha |
GV05chup___u:2182: pitṛhā vai tvam asi mātṛhā vai tvam asi bhrātṛhā vai tvam asi svasṛhā vai tvam asy ācāryahā vai tvam asi brāhmaṇahā vai tvam asīti || ChUp_7,15.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2183: atha yady apy enān utkrāntaprāṇāñ chūlena samāsaṃ vyatiṣaṃdahet |
GV05chup___u:2184: naivainaṃ brūyuḥ pitṛhāsīti na mātṛhāsīti na bhrātṛhāsīti na svasṛhāsīti nācāryahāsīti na brāhmaṇahāsīti || ChUp_7,15.3 ||
GV05chup___u:2186: sa vā eṣa evaṃ paśyann evaṃ manvāna evaṃ vijānann ativādī bhavati |
GV05chup___u:2190: eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati |
GV05chup___u:2194: yadā vai vijānāty atha satyaṃ vadati |
GV05chup___u:2229: yatra nānyat paśyati nānyac chṛṇoti nānyad vijānāti sa bhūmā |
GV05chup___u:2230: atha yatrānyat paśyaty anyac chṛṇoty anyad vijānāti tad alpam |
GV05chup___u:2234: sve mahimni yadi vā na mahimnīti || ChUp_7,24.1 ||
GV05chup___u:2235: go 'śvam iha mahimety ācakṣate hastihiraṇyaṃ dāsabhāryaṃ kṣetrāṇy āyatanānīti |
GV05chup___u:2238: anyo hy anyasmin pratiṣṭhita iti || ChUp_7,24.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2239: sa evādhastāt sa upariṣṭāt sa paścāt sa purastāt sa dakṣiṇataḥ sa uttarataḥ |
GV05chup___u:2242: aham evādhastād aham upariṣṭād ahaṃ paścād ahaṃ purastād ahaṃ dakṣiṇato 'ham uttarato 'ham evedaṃ sarvam iti || ChUp_7,25.1 ||
GV05chup___u:2244: ātmaivādhastād ātmopariṣṭād ātmā paścād ātmā purastād ātmā dakṣiṇata ātmottarata ātmaivedaṃ sarvam iti |
GV05chup___u:2245: sa vā eṣa evaṃ paśyann evaṃ manvāna evaṃ vijānann ātmaratir ātmakrīḍa ātmamithuna ātmānandaḥ sa svarāḍ bhavati |
GV05chup___u:2247: atha ye 'nyathāto vidur anyarājānas te kṣayyalokā bhavanti |
GV05chup___u:2248: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣv akāmacāro bhavati || ChUp_7,25.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2249_0: tasya ha vā etasyaivaṃ paśyata evaṃ manvānasyaivaṃ vijānata ātmataḥ prāṇa ātmata
GV05chup___u:2249_1: āśātmataḥ smara ātmata ākāśa ātmatas teja ātmata āpa ātmata āvirbhāvatirobhāvāv ātmato
GV05chup___u:2249_2: 'nnam ātmato balam ātmato vijñānam ātmato dhyānam ātmataś cittam ātmataḥ saṃkalpa
GV05chup___u:2249_3: ātmato mana ātmato vāg ātmato nāmātmato mantrā ātmataḥ karmāṇy ātmata evedaṃ sarvam
GV05chup___u:2251: na paśyo mṛtyuṃ paśyati na rogaṃ nota duḥkhatām |
GV05chup___u:2252: sarvaṃ ha paśyaḥ paśyati sarvam āpnoti sarvaśaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2254: sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati pañcadhā |
GV05chup___u:2255: saptadhā navadhā caiva punaś caikādaśa smṛtaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2256: śataṃ ca daśa caikaś ca sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ |
GV05chup___u:2260: tasmai mṛditakaṣāyāya tamasas pāraṃ darśayati bhagavān sanatkumāraḥ |
GV05chup___u:2262: atha yad idam asmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminn antarākāsaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2263: tasmin yad antas tad anveṣṭavyaṃ tad vāva vijijñāsitavyam iti || ChUp_8,1.1 ||
GV05chup___u:2264: taṃ ced brūyur yad idam asmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminn antarākāśaḥ kiṃ tad atra vidyate yad anveṣṭavyaṃ yad vāva vijijñāsitavyam iti |
GV05chup___u:2266: yāvān vā ayam ākāśas tāvān eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2268: ubhāv agniś ca vāyuś ca sūryācandramasāv ubhau vidyun nakṣatrāṇi |
GV05chup___u:2269: yac cāsyehāsti yac ca nāsti sarvaṃ tad asmin samāhitam iti || ChUp_8,1.3 ||
GV05chup___u:2270: taṃ ced brūyur asmiṃś cedaṃ brahmapure sarvaṃ samāhitaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmā yad enaj jarā vāpnoti pradhvaṃsate vā kiṃ tato 'tiśiṣyata iti || ChUp_8,1.4 ||
GV05chup___u:2272: nāsya jarayaitaj jīryati na vadhenāsya hanyate |
GV05chup___u:2273: etat satyaṃ brahmapuram asmin kāmāḥ samāhitāḥ |
GV05chup___u:2274: eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2275: yathā hy eveha prajā anvāviśanti yathānuśāsanam |
GV05chup___u:2276: yaṃ yam antam abhikāmā bhavanti yaṃ janapadaṃ yaṃ kṣetrabhāgaṃ taṃ tam evopajīvanti || ChUp_8,1.5 ||
GV05chup___u:2277: tad yatheha karmajito lokaḥ kṣīyata evam evāmutra puṇyajito lokaḥ kṣīyate |
GV05chup___u:2278: tad ya ihātmānam ananuvidya vrajanty etāṃś ca satyān kāmāṃs teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣv akāmacāro bhavati |
GV05chup___u:2279: atha ya ihātmānam anivudya vrajanty etaṃś ca satyān kāmāṃs teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati || ChUp_8,1.6 ||
GV05chup___u:2313: yo yo hy asyetaḥ praiti na tam iha darśanāya labhate || ChUp_8,3.1 ||
GV05chup___u:2314: atha ye cāsyeha jīvā ye ca pretā yac cānyad icchan na labhate sarvaṃ tad atra gatvā vindate |
GV05chup___u:2315: atra hy asyaite satyāḥ kāmā anṛtāpidhānāḥ |
GV05chup___u:2316: tad yathāpi hiraṇyanidhiṃ nihitam akṣetrajñā upary upari sañcaranto na vindeyuḥ |
GV05chup___u:2317: evam evemāḥ sarvāḥ prajā ahar ahar gacchantya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ na vindanty anṛtena hi pratyūḍhāḥ || ChUp_8,3.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2319: tasyaitad eva niruktaṃ hṛdy ayam iti tasmād dhṛd ayam |
GV05chup___u:2320: ahar ahar vā evaṃvit svargaṃ lokam eti || ChUp_8,3.3 ||
GV05chup___u:2321: atha ya eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpenābhiniṣpadyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca |
GV05chup___u:2323: tasya ha vā etasya brahmaṇo nāma satyam iti || ChUp_8,3.4 ||
GV05chup___u:2324: atha ya ātmā sa setur dhṛtir eṣāṃ lokānām asaṃbhedāya |
GV05chup___u:2325: naitaṃ setum ahorātre tarato na jarā na mṛtyur na śoko na sukṛtam |
GV05chup___u:2328: tasmād vā etaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā andhaḥ sann anandho bhavati |
GV05chup___u:2331: tasmād vā etaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā api naktam ahar evābhiniṣpadyate |
GV05chup___u:2332: sakṛd vibhāto hy evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ || ChUp_8,4.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2333: tad ya evaitaṃ brahmalokaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindanti teṣām evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2334: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati || ChUp_8,4.3 ||
GV05chup___u:2335: atha yad yajña ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chup___u:2336: brahmacaryeṇa hy eva yo jñātā taṃ vindate |
GV05chup___u:2337: atha yad iṣṭam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chup___u:2339: atha yat sattrāyaṇam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chup___u:2340: brahmacaryeṇa hy eva sata ātmanas trāṇaṃ vindate |
GV05chup___u:2341: atha yan maunam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chup___u:2342: brahmacaryeṇa hy evātmānam anuvidya manute || ChUp_8,5.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2343: atha yad anāśakāyanam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chup___u:2344: eṣa hy ātmā na naśyati yaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindate |
GV05chup___u:2345: atha yad araṇyāyanam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chup___u:2346: tat araś ca ha vai ṇyaś cārṇavau brahmaloke tṛtīyasyām ito divi |
GV05chup___u:2349: tad aparājitā pūr brahmaṇaḥ prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayam || ChUp_8,5.3 ||
GV05chup___u:2350: tad ya evaitāv araṃ ca ṇyaṃ cārṇavau brahmaloke brahmacaryeṇānuvindanti teṣām evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2351: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati || ChUp_8,5.4 ||
GV05chup___u:2352: atha yā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyas tāḥ piṅgalasyāṇimnas tiṣṭhanti śuklasya nīlasya pītasya lohitasyeti |
GV05chup___u:2353: asau vādityaḥ piṅgala eṣa śukla eṣa nīla eṣa pīta eṣa lohitaḥ || ChUp_8,6.1 ||
GV05chup___u:2354: tad yathā mahāpatha ātata ubhau grāmau gacchatīmaṃ cāmuṃ caivam evaitā ādityasya raśmaya ubhau lokau gacchantīmaṃ cāmuṃ ca |
GV05chup___u:2355: amuṣmād ādityāt pratāyante tā āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptāḥ |
GV05chup___u:2356: ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante te 'muṣminn āditye sṛptāḥ || ChUp_8,6.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2357: tad yatraitat suptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānāti |
GV05chup___u:2360: tejasā hi tadā saṃpanno bhavati || ChUp_8,6.3 ||
GV05chup___u:2362: tam abhita āsīnā āhur jānāsi māṃ jānāsi mām iti |
GV05chup___u:2363: sa yāvad asmāc charīrād anutkrānto bhavati |
GV05chup___u:2367: sa om iti vā hod vā mīyate |
GV05chup___u:2368: sa yāvat kṣipyen manas tāvad ādityaṃ gacchati |
GV05chup___u:2369: etad vai khalu lokadvāraṃ viduṣāṃ prapadanaṃ nirodho 'viduṣām || ChUp_8,6.5 ||
GV05chup___u:2371: śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyas tāsāṃ mūrdhānam abhiniḥsṛtaikā |
GV05chup___u:2372: tayordhvam āyann amṛtatvam eti viṣvaṅṅ anyā utkramaṇe bhavanty utkramaṇe bhavanti || ChUp_8,6.6 ||
GV05chup___u:2373: ya ātmā apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2374: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānātīti ha prajāpatir uvāca || ChUp_8,7.1 ||
GV05chup___u:2376: te hocur hanta tam ātmaānam anvecchāmo yam ātmānam anviṣya sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān iti |
GV05chup___u:2378: tau hāsaṃvidānāv eva samitpāṇī prajāpatisakāśam ājagmatuḥ || ChUp_8,7.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2379: tau ha dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryam ūṣatuḥ |
GV05chup___u:2382: tau hocatur ya ātmā apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2383: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānātīti bhagavato vaco vedayante |
GV05chup___u:2385: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛṣyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca |
GV05chup___u:2387: atha yo 'yaṃ bhagavo 'psu parikhyāyate yaś cāyam ādarśe katama eṣa iti |
GV05chup___u:2388: eṣa u evaiṣu sarveṣvannteṣu parikhyāyata iti hovāca || ChUp_8,7.4 ||
GV05chup___u:2389: udaśarāva ātmānam avekṣya yad ātmano na vijānīthas tan me prabrūtam iti |
GV05chup___u:2391: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti |
GV05chup___u:2392: tau hocatuḥ sarvam evedam āvāṃ bhagava ātmānaṃ paśyāva ā lomabhyaḥ ā nakhebhyaḥ pratirūpam iti || ChUp_8,8.1 ||
GV05chup___u:2393: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvodaśarāve 'vekṣethām iti |
GV05chup___u:2394: tau ha sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvodaśarāve 'vekṣāṃ cakrāte |
GV05chup___u:2395: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti || ChUp_8,8.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2396: tau hocatur yathaivedam āvāṃ bhagavaḥ sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau sva evam evemau bhagavaḥ sādhvallaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtāv iti |
GV05chup___u:2401: anupalabhyātmānam ananuvidya vrajato yatara etadupaniṣado bhaviṣyanti devā vā asurā vā te parābhaviṣyantīti |
GV05chup___u:2402: sa ha śāntahṛdaya eva virocano 'surāñ jagāma |
GV05chup___u:2403: tebhyo haitām upaniṣadaṃ provāca ātmaiveha mahayya ātmā paricaryaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2404: ātmānam eveha mahayann ātmānaṃ paricarann ubhau lokāv āpnotīmaṃ cāmuṃ ceti || ChUp_8,8.4 ||
GV05chup___u:2405: tasmād apyaddyehādadānam aśraddadhānam ayajamānam āhur āsuro bateti |
GV05chup___u:2408: etena hy ammuṃ lokaṃ jeṣyanto manyante || ChUp_8,8.5 ||
GV05chup___u:2409: atha hendro 'prāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa |
GV05chup___u:2410_0: yathaiva khalv ayam asmiñ charīre sādhvalaṃkṛte sādhvalaṃkṛto bhavati suvasane suvasanaḥ
GV05chup___u:2410_1: pariṣkṛte pariṣkṛta evam evāyam asminn andhe 'ndho bhavati srāme srāmaḥ parivṛkṇe parivṛkṇaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2411: asyaiva śarīrasya nāśam anv eṣa naśyati |
GV05chup___u:2415: maghavan yac chāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ sārdhaṃ virocanena kim icchan punar āgama iti |
GV05chup___u:2416_0: sa hovāca yathā eva khalvayyaṃ bhagavo 'smiñ charīre sādhvalaṃkṛte sādhvalaṃkṛto
GV05chup___u:2416_1: bhavati suvasane suvasanaḥ pariṣkṛte pariṣkṛta evam evāyam asminn andhe 'ndho bhavati
GV05chup___u:2417: asyaiva śarīrasya nāśam anv eṣa naśyati |
GV05chup___u:2424: ya eṣa svapne mahīyamānaś caraty eṣa ātmeti hovāca |
GV05chup___u:2427: sa hāprāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa |
GV05chup___u:2428: tad yady apīdaṃ śarīram andhaṃ bhavaty anandhaḥ sa bhavati yadi srāmam asrāmaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2435: api roditīva nāham atra bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti || ChUp_8,10.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2438: maghavan yac chāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ kim icchan punar āgama iti |
GV05chup___u:2440: tad yady apīdaṃ bhagavaḥ śarīram andhaṃ bhavaty anandhaḥ sa bhavati yadi srāmam asrāmaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2454: tad yatraitat suptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātyeṣa ātmeti hovāca |
GV05chup___u:2457: sa hāprāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa |
GV05chup___u:2458: nāha khalv ayam evaṃ saṃpraty ātmānaṃ jānāty ayam aham asmīti |
GV05chup___u:2463: taṃ ha prajāpatir uvāca - maghavan yac chāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ kim icchan punar āgama iti |
GV05chup___u:2464: sa hovāca nāha khalv ayaṃ bhagava evaṃ saṃpraty ātmānaṃ jānāty ayam aham asmīti |
GV05chup___u:2475: ekaśataṃ ha vai varṣāṇi maghavān prajāpatau brahmacaryam uvāsa |
GV05chup___u:2477: maghavan martyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīram āttaṃ mṛtyunā |
GV05chup___u:2480: na vai saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyayor apahatir asti |
GV05chup___u:2481: aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ || ChUp_8,12.1 ||
GV05chup___u:2484: tad yathaitāny amuṣmād ākāśāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyante || ChUp_8,12.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2485: evam evaiṣa saṃprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate |
GV05chup___u:2487: sa tatra paryeti jakṣat krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ strībhir vā yānair vā jñātibhir vā nopajanaṃ smarann idaṃ śarīram |
GV05chup___u:2488: sa yathā prayogya ācaraṇe yukta evam evāyam asmiñ charīre prāṇo yuktaḥ || ChUp_8,12.3 ||
GV05chup___u:2489: atha yatraitad ākāśam anuviṣaṇṇaṃ cakṣuḥ sa cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo darśanāya cakṣuḥ |
GV05chup___u:2490: atha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā gandhāya ghrāṇam |
GV05chup___u:2491: atha yo vededam abhivyāharāṇīti sa ātmā abhivyāhārāya vāk |
GV05chup___u:2492: atha yo vededaṃ śṛṇvānīti sa ātmā śravaṇāya śrotram || ChUp_8,12.4 ||
GV05chup___u:2493: atha yo vededaṃ manvānīti sa ātmā |
GV05chup___u:2495: sa vā eṣa etena daivena cakṣuṣā manasaitān kāmān paśyan ramate ya ete brahmaloke || ChUp_8,12.5 ||
GV05chup___u:2496: taṃ vā etaṃ devā ātmānam upāsate |
GV05chup___u:2497: tasmāt teṣāṃ sarve ca lokā āttāḥ sarve ca kāmāḥ |
GV05chup___u:2498: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānāti |
GV05chup___u:2499: iti ha prajāpatir uvāca prajāpatir uvāca || ChUp_8,12.6 ||
GV05chup___u:2502: aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpaṃ candra iva rāhor mukhāt pramucya dhūtvā śarīram akṛtaṃ kṛtātmā brahmalokam abhisaṃbhavāmīty abhisaṃbhavāmīti || ChUp_8,13.1 ||
GV05chup___u:2504: te yadantarā tad brahma tad amṛtaṃ sa ātmā |
GV05chup___u:2505: prajāpateḥ sabhāṃ veśma prapadye yaśo 'haṃ bhavāmi brāhmaṇānāṃ yaśo rājñām yaśo viśām |
GV05chup___u:2508: śyetam adatkam adatkaṃ śyetaṃ lindu mābhigāṃ lindu mābhigām || ChUp_8,14.1 ||
GV05chup___u:2509: tad dhaitad brahmā prajāpataya uvāca prajāpatir manave manuḥ prajābhyaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2510_0: ācāryakulād vedam adhītya yathāvidhānaṃ guroḥ karmātiśeṣeṇābhisamāvṛtya kuṭumbe śucau
GV05chup___u:2510_1: deśe svādhyāyam adhīyāno dharmikān vidadhad ātmani sarvendriyāṇi saṃpratiṣṭhāpyāhiṃsan
GV05chup___u:2511: sa khalv evaṃ vartayan yāvad āyuṣaṃ brahmalokam abhisaṃpadyate |
GV05chup___u:2512: na ca punar āvartate na ca punar āvartate || ChUp_8,15.1 ||
